content.question: What is the magnitude of the average electric field between points <math alttext="x equals 0.10 meter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals 0.20 meter" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0.20</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>m</mtext> </mstyle> </math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
